member.name: ITfPersistentPropertyLoaderACP.LoadProperty
member.param: Pointer to a structure that identifies the property to load. This structure contains the same data as the structure passed to .
Pointer to an IStream interface pointer that receives the stream object.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: One or more parameters are invalid.

member.name: ITfPersistentPropertyLoaderACP
member.summary: The ITfPersistentPropertyLoaderACP interface is implemented by an application and used by the TSF manager to load properties asynchronously. An application passes an instance of this interface when calling . When properties are loaded by a call to ITextStoreACPServices.Unserialize , this interface is used to load properties when required rather than all at once.
